chapter.text: You begin to crawl to another hiding spot, trying to stay out of sight, when you notice the monster isnâ€™t walking towards you. ^1500You watch as it reaches behind the front desk and rummages around the library office supplies. ^1500It pulls out a paper guillotine and rips off the blade. ^1500You watch as it slides the blade across its fingertips. ^1500It turns back around and marches towards you, dragging the blade across the floor behind it, a dark liquid dripping from its fingertips.
